item.title: Prank-O
item.dc:creator: sharktankguide
item.description:
I fell for this company as soon as I heard their pitch on Shark Tank. How could you not love a business that sells an empty box for $8? One of the founders worked at The Onion, the other is an experienced Graphic Designer. Together they have created a company that sells prank gift boxes....
Read More
item.content:encoded:
I fell for this company as soon as I heard their pitch on Shark Tank. How could you not love a business that sells an empty box for $8?

One of the founders worked at The Onion, the other is an experienced Graphic Designer. Together they have created a company that sells prank gift boxes. You buy a box for a prank gift and then include your real gift inside. What a brilliant idea!

They were featured on Season 10, Episode 7 and received multiple offers but ultimately accepted a deal from Barbara. I canâ€™t wait to see how their company does.

Visit Prank-O on Amazon
